The study conduct two site ( San Juan , PR Boston , MA ) , multiple clinic . Eligible patient randomize baseline one three condition ; 1 ) ECLA-T ( telephone ) intervention , 2 ) ECLA-F ( face face ) intervention , 3 ) usual care . Usual care consider care usual participate clinic patient screen depression . The ECLA-T intervention base telephone-plus-care-management intervention show effective decrease depressive symptom increase client satisfaction self-perceived global improvement , compare usual care depress patient primary care setting . All participant receive baseline interview assessment prior randomization . After treatment completion ( 2 3 month baseline ) , patient complete end-of-treatment ( EOT ) assessment , include repeat assessment baseline measurement . A 4-month follow-up baseline schedule , replicate EOT assessment . For patient intervention condition , session clinician use CBT motivational enhancement strategy engage patient treatment enhance retention . The CBT intervention compose shortened version original CBT intervention , comprise module focus identify correct negative distortion cognition , promote behavioral activation engage patient pleasant activity , develop supportive relationship . All session tailor within structured format consider patient 's need always employ collaborative approach patient . The first four session occur weekly . Every week clinician evaluate patient PHQ-9 determine level depressive symptom . After four session , improvement two four bi-weekly session schedule . If minimal improvement , session continue weekly total 8 session maximum 3 month treatment . Cases show improvement deterioration receive intensive monitoring supervise clinician site .
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible Latinos , least 18 year age , score 10 PHQ9 meet least one essential criterion Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) . Exclusion criterion include history psychosis , use specialty mental health treatment within 3 month prior baseline appointment mental health provider within next two month , inability demonstrate capacity consent evidence suicidal thought ideation measure affirmative response question 4 5 Paykel Suicide Questionnaire ) .
